name: Quizzle
tag_list: personal-finance, money-management, free-credit-report, free-credit-score, credit-improvement, personal-budget, home-loan, home-value-estimate, credit-management, money-saving-tips
overview:
Quizzle is a personal finance Web site that provides free tools and information to help consumers manage their home, money and credit â€“ all in one spot.

By joining Quizzle, which does not require a Social Security Number or credit card, each user receives a free credit report and score, home value estimate, home loan recommendations, budget planner and advice on how to improve. Quizzle also offers additional services to help consumers manage and improve their financial situations, like a Credit Personal Trainer, credit monitoring, identity theft protection, a debt management tool and access to a network of Certified Financial Planners.
